#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

// shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> make_msg(uint64_t oid, const string& op, const string& k, const string& v) {
//   auto msg = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
//   msg->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
//   msg->data_.push_back("put");
//   msg->data_.push_back(k);
//   msg->data_.push_back(v);
// }

#define JKV_TIMEOUT (1000000)

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  // Log_info("PUT %d locid: %d", std::this_thread::get_id(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  auto msg = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  msg->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  msg->data_.push_back("put");
  msg->data_.push_back(k);
  msg->data_.push_back(v);
  
  uint64_t index = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  auto smsg = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(msg);
  auto wait_event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto res = make_shared<string>();
  auto p = make_pair(wait_event, res);
  // buffer_lock.lock();
  if (!GetRaftServer().Start(smsg, &index, &term)) {
    // we're not leader
    // buffer_lock.unlock();
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // Log_info("PUT %d elements in data", msg->data_.size());
  responses.insert({oid, p});
  // buffer_lock.unlock();
  wait_event->Wait(JKV_TIMEOUT);


  if (wait_event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    // Timedout
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  } else {
    // Success?
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
}

// use some kind of buffer

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  // Log_info("APP %d locid: %d", std::this_thread::get_id(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  auto msg = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  msg->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  msg->data_.push_back("append");
  msg->data_.push_back(k);
  msg->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  auto smsg = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(msg);
  auto wait_event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto res = make_shared<string>();
  auto p = make_pair(wait_event, res);
  // buffer_lock.lock();
  if (!GetRaftServer().Start(smsg, &index, &term)) {
    // we're not leader
    // buffer_lock.unlock();
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // Log_info("APPEND %d elements in data", msg->data_.size());
  responses.insert({oid, p});
  // buffer_lock.unlock();
  wait_event->Wait(JKV_TIMEOUT);


  if (wait_event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    // Timedout
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  } else {
    // Success?
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  // Log_info("GET %d locid: %d", std::this_thread::get_id(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  auto msg = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  msg->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  msg->data_.push_back("get");
  msg->data_.push_back(k);
  msg->data_.push_back("noval");
  uint64_t index = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  auto smsg = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(msg);
  auto wait_event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto res = make_shared<string>();
  auto p = make_pair(wait_event, res);
  // buffer_lock.lock();
  if (!GetRaftServer().Start(smsg, &index, &term)) {
    // we're not leader
    // buffer_lock.unlock();
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // Log_info("GET %d elements in data", msg->data_.size());
  responses.insert({oid, p});
  // buffer_lock.unlock();
  wait_event->Wait(JKV_TIMEOUT);
  if (wait_event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    // Timedout
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  } else {
    // Log_info("%s returning", res);
    *v = *res;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  // Log_info("NEXT COMMAND %d locid: %d", std::this_thread::get_id(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  // string oid = v->data_.at(0);

  // Log_info("%d elements in data", v->data_.size());

  if (v->data_.size() != 4) {
    // Log_info("Log length not correct");
    return;
  }

  string value = v->data_.back();
  v->data_.pop_back();
  string key = v->data_.back();
  v->data_.pop_back();
  string op = v->data_.back();
  v->data_.pop_back();
  uint64_t oid = std::stol(v->data_.back());
  v->data_.pop_back();

  // uint64_t oid = std::stol(v->data_.at(0));
  // string op = v->data_.at(1);
  // string key = v->data_.at(2);
  
  bool started_command = false;
  // std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(buffer_lock);
  if (responses.find(oid) != responses.end()) {
    started_command = true;
  }
  if (started_command && responses.at(oid).first->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    responses.erase(oid);
    return;
  }
  if (op == "get") {
    if (started_command) {
      *responses.at(oid).second = internal_kv.at(key);
      // Log_info("Get request returning %s of len %d", internal_kv.at(key), internal_kv.at(key).size());
    }
  } else if (op == "put") {
    if (internal_kv.find(key) != internal_kv.end()) {
      // Log_info("Removing old value");
      internal_kv.erase(key);
    }
    internal_kv.insert(make_pair(key, value));
    // Log_info("Inserting %s, %d", value, value.size());
  } else if (op == "append") {
    string old_val = "";
    if (internal_kv.find(key) != internal_kv.end()) {
      old_val = internal_kv.at(key);
      internal_kv.erase(key);
    }

    // Log_info("oldv len %d", old_val.size());
    string new_val = old_val + value;
    // Log_info("Append request old: %s, app: %s, new: %s", old_val, value, new_val);
    // Log_info("oldv len %d, app len %d, new_len: %d", old_val.size(), value.size(), new_val.size());
    internal_kv.insert(make_pair(key, new_val));
  } else {
    // Log_debug("Didn't match any ops");
    throw new std::exception();
  }

  if (started_command) {
    responses.at(oid).first->Set(1);
    responses.erase(oid);
  }
  
  return;
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
